POLL WATCHER's TOOLKIT

CanvasserOfficial paid, temporary Election worker who processes and counts the votes. Chosen by the local Board of Elections. Canvassing dates vary but, generally, Mail-in canvassing begins April 22nd and Provisional and Election Day ballots are counted beginning May 22nd and May 24th. Let us know if you would like to be recommended to be a Canvasser. Request Recommendation
